list_definition.definition: the act or fact of losing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was suffering from loss of memory
He was mourning the loss (= death) of his friend.
It was only after he was dead that we realized what a loss he was.

list_definition.definition: the amount (especially of money) which is lost

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This month the company recorded a loss of £550, 000.

list_ex_of_english: He saw little chance of recouping war losses easily.
A young policeman in a leather jacket painfully, letter by letter, typed my losses on an ancient machine.
